name: AVMetadataFaceObject
desc: Face information detected by a metadata capture output.

items.name: var faceID: Int
items.desc: The unique ID for this face metadata object.

items.name: var hasRollAngle: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether there is a valid roll angle associated with the face.

items.name: var rollAngle: CGFloat
items.desc: The roll angle of the face specified in degrees.

items.name: var hasYawAngle: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether there is a valid yaw angle associated with the face.

items.name: var yawAngle: CGFloat
items.desc: The yaw angle of the face specified in degrees.
